title: Get the Logitech C920X webcam for just $60 right now
content:
The COVID-19 pandemic led to shortages for many different products, and due to the sudden rise in working from home, webcams were especially hard to buy for a while. Thankfully, prices have more or less stabilized, though webcams are still generally a bit more expensive than they were in 2019 and earlier. Now you can

The post Get the Logitech C920X webcam for just $60 right now appeared first on xda-developers.
description: This Logitech webcam deal brings the Logitech C920X down to $59.99, the lowest price we've seen so far this year.
